segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink overflowing with water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying her plate, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, and she could slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy climbing on that shaky stool to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward; he might fall and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up, but if he drops, she'll be in the way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running down the cabinets; this could ruin the whole kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is still on, and no one's stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those open cabinet doors make the scene even more chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the water before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children look so innocent, but this is dangerous play.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, but inside it's a disaster waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't watch; my heart is racing thinking of the accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
